info.title: Stocklytics Company Data API
info.description: The Company Data API allows you to retrieve company information about a particular stock/ticker code.

get.description: The Company Data API allows you to retrieve company information about a particular stock/ticker code.

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Allows us to identify the request initiator.

parameters.name: stock
parameters.description: The stock code/ticker for the stock to look up.
